ref: 5713 tarūṭa m. ʻ lotus root ʼ lex.
Ku. tarūṛ ʻ a kind of sweet edible root ʼ;
N. tarul ʻ yam, edible root of passion -- flower ʼ, kukur -- t˚ ʻ Dioscoria anguina ʼ, ghar -- t˚ ʻ cultivated yam ʼ, ban -- t˚ ʻ the wild yam Dioscoria daemonica ʼ; --
P. taraṛī f. ʻ the wild yam Dioscoria deltoides (root used for eating and for washing silk) ʼ;
B. tarui ʻ a cucurbitaceous creeper ʼ;
Or. taraṛā ʻ the cucurbitaceous creeper Luffa amara and
